rstatix 0.4.0.999

Sample n Rows By Group From a Table

sample_n_by.Rd

sample n rows by group from a table using the sample_n() function.

sample_n_by(data, ..., size = 1, replace = FALSE)

Arguments

data

a data frame
...

Variables to group by
size

the number of rows to select
replace

with or without replacement?

Examples

ToothGrowth %>% sample_n_by(dose, supp, size = 2)
#> # A tibble: 12 x 3
#>      len supp   dose
#>    <dbl> <fct> <dbl>
#>  1   9.7 OJ      0.5
#>  2  17.6 OJ      0.5
#>  3  11.5 VC      0.5
#>  4   5.8 VC      0.5
#>  5  20   OJ      1  
#>  6  26.4 OJ      1  
#>  7  16.5 VC      1  
#>  8  15.5 VC      1  
#>  9  22.4 OJ      2  
#> 10  24.8 OJ      2  
#> 11  33.9 VC      2  
#> 12  21.5 VC      2
